Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1968...
Injured on 6/10/1968 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1971, off Bill Graham (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1971, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 6/22/1971...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1971, hitting .339 with 6 HR, 63 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/5/1973 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/23/1975...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Minnesota on 7/27/1975...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 9/2/1975...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 4/13/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 7/14/1976...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1977, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/3/1977 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 4/29/1978...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1978, hitting .404 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1978, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 5/17/1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 4/15/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1980, hitting .565 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1980, hitting .465 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1980, hitting .563 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1980, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 17 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1980, hitting .483 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/26/1980, off Lary Sorensen (TEX)...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Sets a new season AL-Record for Hits with 241 on 9/28/1980...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Baltimore on 6/5/1981...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/5/1982 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Baltimore on 5/3/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1983, hitting .567 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Had 28-game hitting streak snapped on 7/19/1983...

Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1984, hitting .480 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 5/22/1984 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
